description:
Nezumi, Warrior of the Rat, is an ordinary high school student in his normal life. He used his ability, Hundred Paths of Nezumi-san, to become the Taisen`s lone survivor, and in the process learned the wishes of the battle`s other participants. When Duodecuple reappears and prompts him for his answer, Nezumi does as Ox taught him, and offers the one answer that is right for him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Doushitemo Kanaetai Tatta Hitotsu no Negai to Wari to Sou demo Nai 99 no Negai
Le vœu à réaliser absolument et les 99 autres moins importants
The One Wish That Must Be Granted, and the Ninety-nine That Can Be Done Without
どうしても叶えたいたったひとつの願いと割とそうでもない99の願い
꼭 이루고 싶은 단 하나의 소원가 별로 그렇지도 않은 99개의 소원
